description:
Marginal #4 is steadily widening their reach, but then a suspected love affair of Atom`s gets scooped by a magazine!
Rui, L, and R cannot conceil their surprise about the scandal surrounding Atom`s love, especially since he always takes care of the Starclusters.
When Marginal #4 is facing their biggest crisis since their founding, their kouhai idol group, Unicorn JR suddenly show up right before their debut?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Supernova Rival Born from a Mistake
ミスから強敵[ライバ]る超新星
